snippet.title: Soda Crisis Trailer丨Free Demo Available On Steam Now
snippet.description:
A Crisis on Earth! Cola to the Rescue! Our fast-paced side-scrolling shooter game [Soda Crisis] is now under development! Plus a Free Demo is now available to play on Steam. 
Play as a mysterious character, equipped with advanced high-tech gears and fierce combating skills - definitely the chosen one for the rescue mission! Happy Gaming！And we look forward to your thoughts! #madewithunity @gamedevhp

Wishlist on Steam now： https://store.steampowered.com/app/1592670/
Official Twitter: https://twitter.com/CrisisSoda
